pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Calgary Mayor Naheed Nenshi | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met with Calgary Mayor Naheed Nenshi, prior to an event highlighting the Government of Canada’s commitment to invest up to $1.53 billion to build the new Green Line as part of Calgary’s Light Rail Transit system.

The Prime Minister and the Mayor discussed a range of issues of importance to Calgary, including housing and economic diversification and development initiatives.

The Prime Minister thanked Mayor Nenshi for his years of public service, and for his unwavering commitment to Calgary and Calgarians.

  • 4,500 more homes for Canadians
